author: legoguy_3000_
title: Another good set
review:
I built this out of lego because I was bored and i got it right now.

pros:
easy to build
you can rebuild it into a snail or a boat
stands up

cons:
horns are yellow which look weird
only build one at a time
not very exiting because only a basic set

a good bull 4/5

author: hustla187
title: Chaarge!
review: This is a nice little bull made back in 1998. I like the use of Spanish colors in this set which really makes people think of bullfighting. The orange horns are good, but should be white. The Loch Ness monster model isn't bad either.
